data.name: Cats in Heat
data.detailed_description:
Multitude of choices - Personalize YOUR story!

  • With close to 100 total choice points, immerse yourself in daily life with catgirls!
  • Some choices change the course of the scene, some let you express yourself... or just see what happens.
  • High replayability - with branching dialogue and action trees, each time you might discover something new.

You're in control!

  • Do what the girl asks... Or not! Choose the intensity, start slow and easy or go balls deep on first insertion! (Note: Not every girl will like certain decisions)
  • For most actions, there's a reaction. Be it change in illustration or dialogue.

Several fetishes and positions!

Includes: vaginal and anal sex in a few positions; bondage; blowjob, throatfuck, ear penetration, undressing, clothed sex.
    For more details please check Mature Content Description section above.

Dynamic Context CGs!

Each of 6 sex scenes has multiple visual and/or descriptive variations depending on your choices!

data.short_description: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 catgirls, plenty of choices, comedy and sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Features explicit cartoon sex scenes with full nudity, including oral, vaginal and anal penetration (all optional).

All characters are over 21 years old. Scenes are mostly consensual, depending on player's choices. 

Includes optional themes:
- questionable consent
- submission and dominance
- bondage
- rough sex
- public sex
- highly inappropriate jokes

Includes alcohol overuse effect.
